Class StockHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • handlers.StockHandler

  • public class StockHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class instantiate the Stock Handler class This class hold list of Ingredient list and two string global variable to hold database username and password
    Author:
    chadz

                                throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        databaseUser - static String value use as database username
        databasePass - static String value use as database password
        Returns:
        null if connection does not work
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
